Membership.title: Memberships & Subscriptions
Membership.subtitle: Natural Uganda coffee, delivered with care.
Membership.intro_body: At UGANDA Coffee Shop, we aim to promote international exchange through the concept of fair trade by delivering authentic coffee from Uganda, known as the Pearl of Africa.
Membership.intro_body_2: We work directly with Ugandan farmers to bring you exceptional quality coffee while supporting global connections. We warmly invite you to experience the true taste of Uganda coffee.
features: Fair-trade coffee grown naturally with great care.
Only fully ripened coffee cherries are hand-picked one by one.
100% natural: no pesticides or chemical fertilizers.
Grown with sustainable agroforestry that protects biodiversity.
Refreshing acidity, mild richness, and sweet citrus-like aromas.
Membership.membership_body: Fresh coffee delivered to your home every month with our subscription plans.
Membership.membership_body_2: All subscription prices include tax and shipping.
